name: Mafia UpStreet Fighting
description:
Mafia UpStreet Fighting is all about the street fight and street combat against the mafia gangs. Street brawl is happening in every corner of crime city. City fight with combat players in fight club is actually the revenge of angry commando in beat em up game. City Fighter in the street fight of fighting games around the martial shadow.
1- Character Selection is available, choose your favorite fighter.
2- Realistic Street Crime City Environment.
3- Easy controls to control the character in the game.
4- Action based music in gameplay.
